page.title: 06CALMORE CROFT FARM
page.content: The farm covers approximately 5 acres and is for the production of broiler chickens.{"Sovereign Chickens"-a {Norfolk based company-bought the site {eleven years ago.}There are six large sheds on the site,each one being four hundred feet long by forty five feet . {Each shed holds approximately one {hundred thousand birds.}These arrive as day old chicks from the hatchery and leave after forty six days when their weight is four and a half pounds each. After being killed at a Lymington plant,and prepared for the table,{they {are sold through large supermarket {chains.} Mr.Jim Green,the present manager, believes that this method of farming will continue for many years to come.
